ygData.subject: Piracy
ygData.msgSnippet: Gladiator Fans, It has come to my attention that there may be some piracy among the mailing list.  It will not continue.  The list is now monitered. Remember
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 10
Message-ID: <17248.10.23.959279670@...>
Date: Thu, 29 Oct 1998 22:05:03 -0500
From: Seth Mitchell <smitchell@...
Subject: Piracy

Gladiator Fans,

It has come to my attention that there may be some piracy among the
mailing list.  It will not continue.  The list is now monitered. 
Remember that pirating software is illegal, and will not be tolerated on
this mailing list.

SgM
